Summary: Biochemical reaction from pravastatin to pravastatin dihydrodiol.
Transport from pravastatin to pravastatin. This interaction is catalyzed by ABCC3.
Transport from 3'alpha-isopravastatin to 3'alpha-isopravastatin. This interaction is catalyzed by SLCO1B1.
Transport from pravastatin to pravastatin. This interaction can be catalyzed by SLC22A6 or SLC22A8.
Transport from pravastatin to pravastatin. This interaction is catalyzed by SLCO2B1.
Transport from pravastatin to pravastatin. This interaction can be catalyzed by ABCC3, ABCC2, ABCB1, ABCB11 or ABCG2.
Transport from pravastatin to pravastatin. This interaction can be catalyzed by SLCO1B1, SLCO2B1 or SLCO1B3.
Transport from pravastatin to pravastatin. This interaction can be catalyzed by ABCC2, ABCB1 or ABCG2.
